name: MSME (Udyam) Registration
shortDescription: The Government of India has introduced MSME or Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprises in agreement with Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises Development (MSMED) Act of 2006.
description: The Government of India has introduced MSME or Micro, Small, and Medium Enterprises in agreement with Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises Development (MSMED) Act of 2006. MSME is vital in contributing to the economy of the country. It not only generates employment but also provides innovation and development opportunities.

content.title: Employment opportunities
content.description: The MSME has provided employment opportunities for rural areas. It has also help set up low capital industry across the country. It has contributed to socio economic development of different communities.

content.title: Promotes entrepreneurship
content.description: The MSME promotes entrepreneurship. It provides individuals vital skill training, capital and knowledge. It helps domestic businesses and strengthens the economy.

content.title: Technological Advancements
content.description: The MSME promotes innovation and technology within the country. It contributes towards IP development and creation of new technology.

faqs.question: Who can apply for MSME Registration?
faqs.answer: Any business entity can Apply and obtain MSME registration. The business entity could be Proprietorships, Partnership Firm, Private Limited Company. Public Limited Company, Limited Liability Partnership, Hindu Undivided Family.

faqs.question: What is the MSMED ACT, 2006?
faqs.answer: The MSMED Act, 2006 facilitates, promotes and governs micro, small and medium enterprises.

faqs.question: What is Udyog Aadhar Memorandum (UAM)?
faqs.answer: Udyog Aadhar Memorandum is a form in self-declaration format. The Udyog Aadhar Number is a unique 12 digit number generated under the UAM.

faqs.question: If I have questions regarding my documents or the process, how can I ask?
faqs.answer: Once you purchase any product from the ezyLegal website, you will be credited minutes in your account. You can use these minutes to connect with the Lawyer and ask questions and take guidance from the Expert.

faqs.question: How to register MSME License in India?
faqs.answer: ezyLegal can help you get your MSME license registered and provide you with the right legal guidance. You can schedule your Consultation with an ezyLegal Lawyer and know the detailed process and advantages of registering MSME license.

faqs.question: How will I know the status of the registration process?
faqs.answer: Status updates will be available on the ezyLegal website (www.ezylegal.in) in your secured Account. Additionally, you will be notified on email and WhatsApp.
